conbody.p:
There are four overall statistics of the customer, with the values aggregated over all its systems:
Total Buckets: The total number of S3 buckets that are deployed by this customer.
S3 Users: The total number of S3 users of the customer.
Object Count: The total number of objects, stored in all buckets of the customer.
Average Object Size: The average object size of all objects, which is the total used storage capacity divided by the object count.

There are four overall statistics of which the values are aggregated over all your systems:
Total Buckets: The total number of S3 buckets aggregated over all your systems.
S3 Users: The total number of S3 users across your systems.
Object Count: The total number of objects, stored in all your buckets.
Average Object Size: The average object size of all objects, which is the total used storage capacity divided by the object count.
